tool_description: Calculates risk-adjusted return metrics including Sharpe ratio, Sortino ratio, Treynor ratio, Jensen's alpha, and beta for performance evaluation.

benchmark_returns.description: Array of benchmark/market returns (same periods as portfolio)

return_frequency.description: Frequency of return data: daily, weekly, monthly, annual

error_messages: Array length mismatch: portfolio_returns and benchmark_returns must have the same length.
Insufficient data: At least 10 return observations required for reliable risk-adjusted metrics.
Invalid return frequency: Use daily, weekly, monthly, or annual.
Risk-free rate error: risk_free_rate must be a valid number (can be positive or negative).
Zero variance error: Cannot calculate risk-adjusted metrics when return variance is zero.
usage: Provide portfolio returns, benchmark returns, and risk-free rate to calculate comprehensive risk-adjusted performance metrics. Specify return frequency for proper annualization.

sharpe_ratio.description: Sharpe ratio (excess return per unit of total risk)

sortino_ratio.description: Sortino ratio (excess return per unit of downside risk)

treynor_ratio.description: Treynor ratio (excess return per unit of systematic risk)

calmar_ratio.description: Calmar ratio (annualized return over maximum drawdown)
